protein.general_function: Involved in acid-amino acid ligase activity
protein.specific_function: E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase which accepts ubiquitin from an E2 ubiquitin-conjugating enzyme in the form of a thioester and then directly transfers the ubiquitin to targeted substrates

reference.reference_text: Gong TW, Huang L, Warner SJ, Lomax MI: Characterization of the human UBE3B gene: structure, expression, evolution, and alternative splicing. Genomics. 2003 Aug;82(2):143-52.
